survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Stylist Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered personal stylist apps to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using the AI-powered personal stylist app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and covers the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using the AI-powered personal stylist app?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal stylist app do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a comprehensive view of feature usage. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted features.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered personal stylist app do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges or frustrations you have encountered while using the AI-powered personal stylist app.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses will provide qualitative insights into user pain points. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges or frustrations you have encountered while using the AI-powered personal stylist app.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the AI-powered personal stylist app to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This is a key metric for gauging user advocacy.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the AI-powered personal stylist app to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the AI-powered personal stylist app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses will help identify potential new features or improvements. Encourage detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the AI-powered personal stylist app?
